<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="needit_transform2">51ca436e8745011036cd64280cbb3591</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

	  if(!("u_requested_for_email" in source)){
    var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase();
    target.u_requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com";
  }

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-17 22:06:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>2a1d4bee8745011036cd64280cbb356d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onStart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_2a1d4bee8745011036cd64280cbb356d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-17 22:06:58</sys_updated_on><when>onStart</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
